description: Variation of Condition 1 and Condition 10 of planning permission dated 12 March 2020 (RN: 18/05446/FULL) for, 'Use of the lower ground and ground floor levels as a restaurant (Class A3); alterations to the shopfronts on North Audley Street and Lees Place and the installation of a high level extract duct on the rear elevation with plant in an acoustic enclosure at rear first floor level' (Land Use Swap with 34 North Audley Street); NAMELY, to allow the refrigeration plant to operate at any time and for amendments to the design of the extract duct on the rear elevation and the plant and acoustic enclosure at rear first floor.
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
